data.name: Globat Pixels
data.detailed_description:
Globat Pixels is an Open-World game unlike any open-world game you played before! "Why?", you may ask. Well, by using OpenStreetMap an skillfully interpreting the data, this game enables you to play literally anywhere in the world. Do you want to play next to the big ben? In front of the Taj Mahal? In the gardens of versailles?
Globat Pixels enables you to do just that. And you dont even have to play alone! You can choose to either play with friends or with bots. And thats not even all of it! Besides having an unlimited amount of maps, there's also a big variety of weapons to choose from!

If even that is still not enough for you, don't worry. You may think that it is generally safe around the world, but you couldn't be any more wrong. Because wherever you are, there will always be the danger of a train suddenly trying to turn you into pixie dust. Now thats what you call dangerous!

Interested?

Start your globat, pixelated adventure now!

Key Features


  • Maps = real places anywhere in the world
  • You decide where you want to play
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Single Player
  • Different weapons

data.short_description: Are you tired of playing on the same old maps over and over again? Well fear no more! With globat pixels you can choose wherever in the world that you want to play. And you dont even have to play alone! You can either fight with your friends or with bots. So stop your boredom and play anywhere you want!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 1GB / Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12.4+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 1GB / Radeon HD 6770
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 1GB / Radeon HD 6770
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
